data.title: The Magicompany- How to find the perfect Entertainer
data.meta_description: Here are some helpful links to get you started while you plan your party. One is a list of locations nearby that can accomodate a large gathering. The other are helpful tips which, compiled by Marcus the Magician, is the basics for what to ask for when you are planning your own event- whether a party with us or not!
data.text:
The Society of American Magicians

The Society of American Magicians, founded on May 10, 1902, in Martinka’s famous magic shop in New York City, New York, is the oldest and most prestigious magical society in the world.

For over a century, it has promoted the ideals shared by Kellar, Houdini, Thurston, and over 45,000 others worldwide who have held membership in the society.

These ideals include the elevation of the Art of Magic, the promotion of harmony among magicians, and the opposition of the unnecessary public exposure of magical effects.

The International Brotherhood of Magicians

The International Brotherhood of Magicians is the world’s largest magical organization.

If you are interested in magic, here is a source of information that opens up many possibilities.

The I.B.M. has 85 years of continuous activities and embraces thousands of members from 73 countries.

There are about 300 branches, known as Rings, all over the world and there could be one close to you.
